comment.author: 27907029@N04
comment._content: I say say with 100% certainty they are on top of Sulphur Mountain in Banff, Alberta. The mountain in the background of the picture is Rundle Mountain. I worked at Sulphur Mountain, which is now the site of the Banff Gondola, and saw this view everyday. The wood in the foreground is most likely  a part of the weather station that was run on top of the mountain. The picture had to be taken sometime between late June and Early September. If you go today the view still of the valley and Rundle Mountain looks exactly the same!
